file_content.text: The Unstoppable Horde's reign is finally over!
You are very brave to face the Unstoppable Horde!
Dead! They're all dead! My entire encampment--gone!
The Unstoppable Horde will destroy us all!
You... you did it? You stopped the Unstoppable?
It's them... the Unstoppable Horde. We'd heard stories, but we didn't believe. I--I must keep moving. Must warn others!
Settle down.
Y--yes... must stay calm. Must breathe.
The Gamorreans, they use special stims, very rare. They won't die, can't die. Just keep fighting and killing.
The Unstoppable Horde has destroyed many settlements. Many Ortolans lost and not one Gamorrean dead.
The Gamorreans, they killed everyone. Ate everything. We tried to fight back, but they laughed at our weapons. Laughed!
I'll deal with them.
Thank you, thank you!
Ortolans can fight, but we can't even hurt the Gamorreans. You bring back their stims and we can study, find a way to beat them.
Are you wounded?
No. I hid. Then I ran. Nothing else I could do!
"Unstoppable Horde"?
Gamorrean raiders. Very strong, didn't even flinch when we shot them.
You seem pretty upset.
Anything I can do to help?
I... no. I saw my brothers fall. Couldn't help them.
Soldiers have big guns, bigger than Ortolans'. But still not enough to hurt the Gamorreans.
Can't help you. [Refuse quest]
And you got their stims! Now we can fight back, beat them ourselves!
I promise, your name shall be sung in Ortolan hymns for years to come!
I promise, your names shall be sung in Ortolan hymns for years to come!
They should still be in our camp, stuffing their fat faces with our supplies. Not far. Make them pay!
Then many more Ortolans will die!
Point the way.
No one's invincible.
You can't fight them alone.
Then fight them. See for yourself.
Gamorreans make everyone's life miserable.
Staying is dangerous. The Gamorreans could come, could find me here!
Stay and we'll deal with this.
They can't die? Ugh.
They won't quit until all Ortolans wiped out. Please, you must stop them!
